upgrades.changelog:
- SDK with fixed dead node issue
- fix Associations not working propely
- fix Parameter 123 min dimming value
- fix Meter CC missing on endpoint 1
- fix double click not working according to specifications
- Fix Detached mode Binary Switch when SW set to toggle
- Improved Mosfet PWM
- Other minor improvements
